name: Pelajar Tangguh: The Multiverse Crossover (Demo)
description:
Hello & welcome everyone, today I want to present a game that I worked on this year, which is a game with the title Pelajar Tangguh: The Multiverse Crossover. Or in the English version is Brave X Valor. This game is adapted from my Animation Series project who also created by me, but this game version is the second Alpha Demo, maybe it's still not 100% full game, because I want to survey first. If it is already 100% full game, of course I will not post and release it here. In this post, you can try and get the  game for free. If maybe you want to support the developer, you can donate below :) okay, that's enough for the explanation, let's have look the game in detail below:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME DETAILS

--Game Title--
Original Version : Pelajar Tangguh - The Multiverse Crossover
English Version : Brave X Valor
Developer : Anigames Project
Genre : Action, Adventure, Fantasy, RPG
Version : Alpha Demo v2
Rate : 16+
Release Date : 01 August 2022

The second Alpha version of Brave X Valor  is focused on the Indonesian region first, because this is still an Alpha version. So maybe the language will be default using Indonesian than English (I will work for the multiple language if the game progress has been completed). Plus this game is still not 100% completed and still unfinish, especially for the Characters and Main Maps of the game, but some other maps are complete and ready to be played thoroughly, plus you can also play this game until the ending of this second Alpha version. So it's not just an ordinary roaming, but you can also do the  Missions/Quests in the game, and complete some Achievements, and others.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME MODES

This Game has 3 different modes, and each game mode have a separate and different gameplay, but they connected to each other, such as the Locked/Unlocked feature, as well as several new places on the game map, etc. You can play them all at once!! *_*

  • STORY MODE 
    This is the main playable mode of the Brave storyline. This mode is separate from other modes, but for this Alpha v2 edition you still can't play this Story Mode. Story Mode will be available when the game has been officially completed 100% and published to the upcoming web game platform.
  • FREEROAM MODE
    This mode is a free mode that you can play in this Alpha v2 edition, with the Open World category, in this mode you can travel and adventure in Multiverse across 2 different worlds. You can run Missions and Quests in this Freeroam Mode, and the storyline in Freeroam mode is different from Story Mode, so this mode has its own Brave X Valor storyline and is specifically played in Single Player and Multiplayer, but Multiplayer is still not ready in this Alpha version (coming soon)
  • ARCADE MODE
    This Arcade Mode is a combat mode of all characters and locations in the game combined, you can play it in turns. With the basic Mini Game Arcade, you can play many stuff  in this Arcade Mode, for example is 1 vs 1 Mode, Gang Battle Mode, Survival Mode, War Mode, Capture Mode, and many more. With the Locked/Unlocked feature for each character, mode, and location, it allows you to collect everything and choose your hero character in this mode.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME FEATURE

The in-game features have been updated and there are quite a few, maybe only a few have been included for this Alpha v2 edition, for more complete features will be present in the full game later.

Game features only occur in the Freeroam Mode, for the Story Mode and Arcade Mode are only standard.

What is the features  in  Brave X Valor  game?

- Missions/Quests
- Interaction (Social & Objects)
- Entering House/Portal
- Vehicle Riding
- Horse Riding
- Usable Weapons
- Recruit Gang / Party
- Player Skills
- Player Swimming
- Inventory (use "X" button to open/close)
- Journal
- Achievements
- Racing
- Shop
- NPCs

All the features in the upcoming full game will be even more interesting than above, but for this Alpha v2 edition, the developer only includes a list of features above, so you can do a lot in the game. :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SYSTEM REQUIREMENT

This system requirement is not final, because it may not be correct, for example if it says high specifications, but when you try it on your PC/Laptop, it can even be played. So please take a survey, and here i am only provides specifications that are appropriate.

Minimum Requirement
  • OS : Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit.
  • Processor : Intel Core i3-3220T 2.8 GHz, AMD Ryzen 3 2200G.
  • Memory : 4 GB RAM.
  • Graphics : Geforce GTX 650 Ti, AMD Radeon HD 6850 X2.
  • DirectX : Version 11.
  • Storage : 20 GB available space.
Recommended 
  • OS : Windows 10 64-bit.
  • Processor : Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz, AMD Ryzen 5 2400G.
  • Memory : 8 GB RAM or Higher.
  • Graphics : Geforce GTX 1050 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 570.
  • DirectX : Version 12.
  • Storage : 30 GB available space.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


BENCHMARKING

Only for Low-end and Mid PC users, if you get low FPS while at school locations, please do :

  • Restart or Load game.
  • Stay away from the school building area
  • If on a mission, finish it quickly and get out of the school area
  • Settings the Graphic in the game options that match on your GPU.
  • Setting Manage 3d on your Nvidia Control Panel desktop for running this game.

MISSING TEXTURE CHARACTER (ONLY FOR PC LOW-END and MID USERS)

If you got a missing texture like this when using Low Settings in game settings, I'm terribly sorry, maybe this is a game rendering factor is not good, for the future it should be perfect.

To fix that, go to Setting > Video > Graphics and  Set Visual Effect Quality to Medium

Maybe there are really had a slight problem for FPS at the school location, because when it was first working this game, the developer used the wrong technique, so that it could burden the gameplay, but the developer has fixed the object that makes lag as much as possible, so it's finally had a quite loose. The developer's intention was to remaking the school building which was making it pretty lag, but there was no time, because the developer wanted to continue the animation project.
So maybe that's the only problem for FPS, the rest is safe and smooth.

This is a screenshot when the developer built the school building for the first time and used the wrong technique, so that it could burden the initial gameplay.

GET THE GAME NOW!!

- Extract zip file PTMC Alpha Demo v2
- Open Installer.exe
- Read the term & license carefully to know the step
- Browse the location folder which you want to installed
- Ready to play

Thank you for supporting this game, i hope you love it soon or later.
SEE YOU AGAIN!
